articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: School roof collapse in western India kills 7 children and injures at least 21 - ABC News
articles.description: A government school building's roof collapsed in Rajasthan, India, killing seven children and injuring at least 21
articles.content:
NEW DELHI -- The roof of a government middle school building collapsed Friday in Indias western state of Rajasthan, killing seven children and injuring at least 21, a senior police official said.
